name: Renfield Hearts Dracula
description:
Dracula is taking a well deserved rest after traumatizing the people of Transylvania. He commands his loyal servant Renfield to keep him safe and sound while he snoozes in his coffin. Unfortunately, the angry mob have figured out where Dracula sleeps and are coming to get him! Help Renfield place his animal "minions" to help protect his beloved Master.

Arrows to move, space or up to jump.

Ctrl or down to pick up animals, down to place them. Use Ctrl to fire off the animal's abilities when held.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 32.
